attributes.action: allow vehicles registered before 1st august 1977 to be eligable for free road fund/tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cars registered on and before 1972 qualify for free road tax. simply after years of this being available update it to include cars upto 1977. there are fewer about now and many are used as secondary vehicles for very few miles a year. surely they have paid enough tax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
